content: $SOFI is chock full of retail😂 You keep doing you kids

$SOFI with a weekly Strat-Shooter bar, highly suggestive that its seen a near-term peak #TheStrat 
 
I don't really follow SOFI due to its having almost a billion shares outstanding, thats just too much for a young co. If they did a 10-1 reverse-split I would be very interested but until then...nope Bearish
Uranium Bros, your time is now as $CCJ has a Darvas Box breakout. Hope it works for you guys/gals #Uranium $URA Bullish

$ELF has one of the best runs in the market bar none but it now has a Pink Bar warning signal. This means "pay attention" as perhaps the Big Boys might have made some decisions. No way to know what so best to keep a close eye on it
I trust my gut feel/first impressions of a chart but timing when something happens is always a mystery $STUDY

Nasdaq has run 13 weeks since the yellow bar buy-signal that marked its start and like SPX I think its gonna take a little rest here and test the conviction of some of these new longs $COMPQ  
 
The spurt in volume this past week feels like short capitulators and FOMO chasers to me. We'll see...

$SPX has run 12 weeks since the yellow bar buy-signal that started it, equal to one quarter of trend 
 
We all know that the final weeks of a trend have the best performance as shorts capitulate, FOMO etc. Coincidentally the last 3 were very good 
 
IMO its likely we take a rest here
I think many genius Traders will start getting stopped out soon $SPX #TimeForARest Bullish

Latest $SPX EPS updates, things have been successful but now we're closer to bumping up against a ceiling 
 
The higher we go the less bullish I get due to Valuation concerns, aka ride the elevator up then step off at your floor 
 
We'll see what happens... Bullish

No matter what they say, the wrap-up to this week is that both major Indexes are in confirmed Darvas Box breakouts (launch week plus two). Started with a yellow bar buy-signal in March and look at it now $SPX $COMPQ 
 
Bull market until proven otherwise📈 Bullish
Let’s not let Bull market stuff go to our heads now $SPX $STUDY Bullish
we know Tech is bullish but I'm comforted seeing $RSP moving higher as well, broaden participation. Last week's yellow bar buy-signal is proving to have been a good signal (knock on wood) Bullish
Feel free to try shorting $NVDA. My research indicates it takes avg of about 12 weeks from launch before something like that is feasible IMO
Shorting $NVDA is literally the stupidest idea on the planet Bullish

Yesterday by the odds should have been a down day; the amount of demand out there may be way bigger than we think

What a week so far $SPX $COMPQ Bullish

everyone all of a sudden LOVES $IOT but its reached former IPO highs and by my math now has a Price/Sales of 15-18x for next TWO years. Did we learn nothing in 2020 LOL??  
 
I think traders should take the Win here, book profits and move on #Sell #TakeTheW Bearish

The power of the subconcious mind unleashed🧠😇📈 
 
All I wanted was to pay for my Vegas trip and instead I may have bought/flipped a recent bottom in coal $AMR  
 
will watch and see if it develops further Bullish

so remember two weeks ago when I went to Vegas and bought coal stocks for some reason? 
 
The power of the subconscious mind/Intention is incredible...did I buy a bottom in $BTU and not know it?? Wish I'd kept it🤔🧠😇 Bullish
$COIN showing no reason to be long, bearish white bar sell-signal on weekly #99Problems #Avoid Bearish
sold $STAA out of family Trust this week. Not happy about it but made a few $$ so on to the next. Family is unconcerned so long as I don't screw up Bearish

$CVNA still has a Bullish weekly Technical pattern, Box breakout with big volume. If I hadn't tried to add while I might still be in the trade with a few points cushion 
 
Raising my cost avg & losing my cushion is what blew it up for me (the usual culprit) $STUDY Bullish

In my experience Intraday screwups always tend to happen at near-term tops etc. Thats because at the open you're all Bullish (like everyone else) and it takes time for the contra-view to sink in $STUDY  
 
those who decided overnight they were going to sell at the open are the⭐️'s

It appears many traders got garthonked in $CVNA Friday. Review of Intra 30 65 130 screen shows sell signals on every TF (Pink Bars etc) 
 
If I was in the office I prob would have bailed at $24, wouldn't have added either. Oh well, a F up but still made $$, on to the next $STUDY

$SMCI the #1 stock, Total 🚀📈 
 
Hurts every time I look at it, feels like it was my personal #ButtFumble Bullish

$PLTR with the Weekly Shooter bar on enormous volume. I sold it last week at $15 and spent most of this week feeling stupid about it. Too funny that it closed right at Monthly resistance/where I sold it. Coincidence?? Nah..... 
 
Could use a rest to digest gains Bullish
Weekly shooter bar on $CELH. This could be a sell/take profits signal for some traders but I'm going to sit and use the weekly MA instead for a LT hold #TrendFollowing Bullish
$ASAN has a very unusual TWO shooter weeks in a row that also qualify as Box breakouts. The market has a twisted sense of humor on this one, totally 50/50 #IDK
Ethereum with a Darvas Box breakdown. Crypto isn't really front and center anymore these days $ETH.X Bearish
Equal-weight Index $RSP had a yellow bar Buy-signal this week, big volume too. Good sign that the rest of the market may start catching up to Tech Bullish
Nasdaq ran into some resistance here. Buyers were met with sellers, equally matched. Next week is literally 50/50 $COMPQ Bullish

Good nights sleep, morning workout, and now time for weekend charts. Always give your brain a rest from the data of the previous week  
  
Important: your first impression of a chart is usually correct. Gut feel tends to be more accurate than Brain analysis IMO $STUDY Bullish
$CVNA closes with a bullish-yet-we'll see look. At $15 cost it's not bad, at $17 cost IDK so....🤷‍♂️

$DOCU similar look. Nothing bullish on either D W M TF's but plenty of bearish looking bars at moment #TheStrat 
 
Note: I start with Box charts then I flip to this view to double-check if any red flags etc. Bearish

back at my desk and I see lots of shooters from my scan (inverse hammers), IMO we may struggle next week 
 
Good example is $PLTR, has signals on D W M that are not very bullish for new $$/trades #TheStrat 
 
Also why I think PLTR needs a few weeks to digest gains and setup again Bearish

Well I give up on $CVNA. Adjusted cost was $17, out at $19, F this LoL🤷🏻‍♂️😂 

$2 gain is better than no gain

Woof, looks like I added to soon, are they gonna take back the whole move??😣$CVNA 

That’s what I get for trading while mobile. Raised my avg into the gap but still

Added to $CVNA on this intraday puke

Long at $15 the day before the rip…very lucky, was not expecting that. 
Adding because I want a larger position/feed the breakout and see what happens Bullish

My sharp HF mgr friend JJ sent me this re NAAIM number and frankly it’s gone red hot☄️🔥

Probably time for markets to take a break to Fu…I mean shake n bake some of these new bulls😆😉 $SPX #NAAIM
This morning I was feeling stupid for selling $PLTR at $15. By the end of the day I was feeling smart again #Fade #Resistance #Normal Bullish

more proof that Growth is back: $FFTY last week had a Box breakout on big green volume AND a yellow bar buy-signal at the same time. Very bullish 
 
Yellow bar signal is a proprietary bullish conditions-scan I created. Bar color turns yellow if/when the scan hits Bullish

lastly, $ASAN wins the crown for "most bearish looking bullish stock" LOL 
 
On Weekly chart its a Darvas Box breakout yet that candle is a Strat-Shooter and is just begging to be sold/shorted. I wouldn't touch this here at all #RiskySpot Bullish

speaking of sketch names, $AI was the centerpiece of this past week yet have you seen any Bullish stocks that had three (!) giant red sell-volume bars?? Like c'mon folks 
 
I'm avoiding it, probably will be a huge battleground between Longs/Shorts going forward #Avoid Bearish

sketch names like $CVNA have made powerful comebacks...is it a sketch name anymore??? IDK but my Dad sold his used Toyota minivan POS to CVNA at what I thought was a way-too generous price😂 
 
Darvas Box breakout on big green volume, the chart has shown positive $$ flow since January Bullish

$NNOX with a Darvas Box breakout on big volume a month ago. What I like is that despite a little bit of volatility there have been zero big red volume bars. That tells me its going higher in the future IMO #WatchingClosely Bullish
$ZS with a Darvas Box breakout. Impressive comeback, 6 weeks ago this was breaking down and a goner, then they had earnings and voila, the market loves them again #GoodList Bullish
remember $AEHR? They're back on the radar with a Darvas Box breakout on big volume. Add them back onto the 'good' list Bullish
$IOT with a Darvas Box breakout on BIG volume. Learned that Baille Gifford bought a bunch, they are big/smart $$. I do hate the shares O/S but besides that the chart looks great to me Bullish

$GLBE with a second Darvas Box breakout. What's unusual to me is the Breakout-Failure-Breakout combo, each on big volume also. You don't see that very often. Bulls winning out at moment, I am #Long Bullish
$MGNI with a Darvas Box breakout on big volume...just barely made the cut but it qualifies. I am #Long Bullish
some bullish charts: $MNDY with a Box breakout on BIG green volume. I am #Long Bullish

Re my subconscious-driven trades I made that paid for Vegas: 
 
I had set an intention re $$ for Vegas the two weeks before, and on Wed all of a sudden I felt the urge to buy Coal ($BTU/$AMR), like wtf? 
 
I sold out on Friday, made $$ on both ($10 holla on AMR) and its crazy because it happened just like Livermore wrote in Reminiscences 
 
Just goes to show the power of Intention with positive outcomes attached🙏😇 
 
PS was completely out of strategy for me and I know many were like Coal? WTF? Not doing that again anytime soon lol Bullish

This may have been dumb but I bought $FSLY (again) on Friday, low $16's.  The rebound made me re-consider plus it's still good valuation compared to NET, plus its Technology was endorsed by a Tech guru I know (that's you E!) 
 
We'll see what happens🤷‍♂️ Bullish

It's heresy but I sold my remaining shares of $PLTR at $15 on Friday. Bought 10's, made roughly 44% in 3 weeks, great ST trade 
 
I mentioned I felt that $15 was the ceiling based on Monthly chart, and now I don't like how the weekly closed mid-point on big volume. I'll be watching Bullish

I did some trading while in Vegas, sold $IONQ for a roughly 10% profit. Chart-wise while I love the big green volume I do NOT like that big red volume bar 
 
I feel I handled it correctly for the moment, we'll see what happens going forward Bullish

latest $SPX EPS estimates. Haven't updated since early May as there was little change, Index now 97% reported and everything looks good. Only debate is the multiple one should pay for future avg Quarterly EPS growth? 18? 20? 22? Beats me🤷‍♂️ 
 
25 PE or about 4700 SPX is the ceiling Bullish

Re Vegas, I play Blackjack different from others in that I always stay on 13 14 15 etc, never hit $STUDY #Blackjack #odds 
 
"The Book" says to hit those but I say F that, I want the dealer to take risk not me. I want to avoid risk and make the dealer beat me which pisses some people off but last I checked "the Book" built multi-billion dollar casinos🙄 
 
Usually works out ok, if you play like evrybody else you won't win🤑 Bullish

$SPX is just now showing up to the party, wouldn't be surprised if a few folks left and stuck it with the check. A tad slow/late, not its fault as its driving a minivan while others are driving Porsches 
 
Top of the Box, we'll see what happens Bullish

$QQQ is a Darvas Box Breakout but you can see the lack of volume here. Works until it doesn't 
 
"Oh volume where art thou??" Bullish

Weekend review: am leaving Las Vegas a winner primarily due to my subconcious-driven coal trades (now closed), more on that soon... 
 
As far as the market goes the Nasdaq is the lead dog with a Box breakout but volume was low so don't be surprised if we come in a bit $COMPQ Bullish
Sent to a friend this morning, so you think $ZIM is investable again?? Completed its round-trip on Monthly chart Bullish

Who needs AI stocks when you’re making $$ in Coal??😂📈 $BTU $AMR

We’ll see how long this lasts Bullish

Sold $IONQ this morning, roughly a 10% gain. It’s a Box breakout but my cost in the $9’s didn’t give a lot of room, and when you get two of these bars so close it tells you it’s prob gone as far as it’ll go for the moment #BankIt

Will look for a better spot in near future Bullish
my Box stuff doesn’t really work for intraday trading. I recommend TheStrat for trading on intraday TF’s $STUDY Bullish

Instead of selling $BTU I’ve kept it and bought some $AMR also, long $136’s

It’s a Livermore “why did I do that?” moment. If my subconscious saw something I’m willing to give it a chance 

Also I think it’s a 2-1-2 rev strat on D so why not #TheStrat Bullish

$AI bites the dust AH?? Gee, who didn’t see that coming??🙄

Heck of a squeeze but that faulty pattern gave it low odds IMO

I must be feeling crazy because I started some $BTU here today. It’s come back down to it’s monthly chart moving average (shows better on TC2000) and if it’s going to start a new trend it’ll likely begin from here. We still need more electricity for AI, right?? 

This is me thinking as an investor not a trader Bullish
A little common sense wins out for the moment $PLTR Bullish
sure found out about $AI today🔥

head on a swivel: D hammertime bars on inflation names, would be a psyche i they started moving while we're all looking at AI stocks $ARCH $AMR $BTU $CF $MOS  
 
just making a note of things here Bullish

Bought $TMDX today in $71's. Had been watching it after its Darvas Box breakout in April failed. Now it's at roughly the Box lows and weekly MA, this is what a decent R/R looks like. Its either Trend-resumption or I'm out Bullish

Sold 1/3 of $PLTR here at $14.98, just above the likely Monthly resistance, will sit on the rest for the LT. Here's my view of it using D W M TF's, this is a Strat-view  
 
Note: for trade management after something is moving I don't use Boxes 
 
I don't really share much intra-day trading because it's too easy to go from right to incredibly wrong but on this I thought I'd show it Bullish

and then there was $SNOW. Everytime I heard something bullish about it I'd shake my head because honestly the chart didn't have anything bullish on it IMO 
 
Breakout failure and red volume are a bad match #Avoid Bearish
I'm very interested to see what happens with $AI and earnings this week because IMO the chart has issues. No position, just curious #Watching

$AMD lovely Darvas Box breakout yet I sold on that earnings down day and then didn't act fast enough when it turned and ripped higher. Mentally its hard selling at $82 then buying back at $90 a day later (F!!) 
 
My supertrader membership got revoked because of this, pricks lol🖕#Sigh Bullish

$PLTR with the big green volume Darvas Box breakout. Many might want to take the fast $$ yet my view is that when you see volume like this one should buy and hold for a few quarters at least. IDK, we'll see what happens #Long Bullish

$NVDA with the huge earnings move yet technically its not a strong Darvas Box breakout bc it didn't have big volume at launch in early May 
 
I think that's what confused me about it, that strange period of below avg volume. Could be a blow-off top but we'll see🔥 Bullish

$RMBS with another Darvas Box breakout.  
 
It doesn't get more obvious of a green $$ flow trend than this and yet somehow none of us were watching, like WTF! Mistake rectified #Long Bullish
$MNDY with a Darvas Box breakout on Big green volume and I'm not sure they even mentioned AI.  Long it from a couple weeks ago #Long Bullish

so many good Technology charts, they can't all be huge winners can they?? 
 
The best ones I see (Box breakouts with BIG green volume) are $AMD $PLTR $RMBS $SMCI $MDB $MNDY 
 
I managed to buy half of them without screwing up. Lots of others with honorable mentions Bullish
$SHY says the $FED is gonna raise, who's ready for more interest rate headlines?? Bearish
$RSP equal-weighted SPX def not doing so well. This is a better look at what the regular US economy is doing and frankly it looks a little sick, no thanks to the dumbos in DC $FED 🙄 Bearish
$IGV Darvas Box breakout sticking out like a flashlight in a dark room. Let me guess...Software/Tech?? Yup Bullish

whoa, as I look for interesting charts I see Health-care got smacked with a Darvas Box breakdown and a Pink bar signal. Was there any stuff in the horrible budget sham that impacted them?? $IYH Bearish
The Russell 2000 index is a giant waste of time, slow boat to nowhere right now $IWM #Avoid

$SPX is reluctantly going higher IMO 
 
Tech stocks are dragging it up but until the $FED stops raising rates it's hard to see a broad rally happening 
 
my Bro-in-law's co has frozen travel spending, also heard that consultants E&Y has locked down travel spend as well #Slowing Bullish
Nasdaq is now close to a Darvas Box breakout, will it be easy or will the usual games be played?? I suspect the latter $COMPQ Bullish

Memorial Day weekend review: get outside and remember those who gave for the rest of us🇺🇸🇺🇸 
 
Tech stocks have been moving up but the rest of the market is hesitant, am sure high interest rates are taking a bite. Has your co cut spending, travel etc?? $SPX $COMPQ Bullish
